|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is shown as being '''Optimum''' branded with its FCC filing's photos :- [http://www.optimum.com/ it is used with '''Cablevision''''s Optimum service]. QCA9880 is the presumed 5GHz radio, but this has not been confirmed. {{see also|Sagemcom F@ST 5250}} ===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a :''Sagemcom'' branded NBS30120250HE (Euro plug). ==See also== :;[https://fr.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bbox Bbox Devices] • [[Bbox Devices]] :;Bbox (B&You) *[[Thomson TG787]] (2008) • ADSL2+ • [[Broadcom]] BCM6358 :;Bbox
